Article.definition: a separate and usually numbered or otherwise marked section

1 a.definition: a separate and usually numbered or otherwise marked section (as of a statute, indictment, will, or other writing)

sub_terms.b: a separate point, charge, count, or clause
sub_terms.c: a condition or stipulation in a document (as a contract)

2.definition: a document setting forth the terms of an agreement usually used in pl. [of merger]
